channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: The House JK Built
channel.desc: JK and Fiorella start making plans for their new home project.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Love It Or List It
channel.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer help a pair of baptist ministers with their four-bedroom in Alnwick, Northumberland.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: The Gardener And Friends
channel.desc: From getting the most out of your shrubs and hedges, to inspirational karoo gardens, and even plants to consider when you have pets.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Real Health
channel.desc: We'll be looking at natural solution to improve immunity. We discover the transformative power of breathwork. We share practical tips and exercises to strengthen back and improve posture.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Carlo's Reno Rescue
channel.desc: Carlos, Jarrod and Jewel are working to help community heroes Teleiai and Rosa Puni with an update of their Kitchen so they can help cater for all the locals they invite to their home.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Ten Minute Kitchen
channel.desc: Asian inspired, starting with Scott's recipe made with leftover chicken and vegetables from a family roast. Using leftovers to create amazing midweek meals is always useful and here is an easy Chicken Noodle Soup recipe.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Escape To The Country
channel.desc: Margherita Taylor is in on a property romp around rural Shropshire helping her house hunters find a country home which they'll hopefully fall in love with and buy.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Design For You
channel.desc: Cathrin Bolt showcases luxury living in her latest design. Designer Eyaaz Waja talks about the Evolution of Interior Design. We also meet Michael from Umdabu, creating handcrafted wood furniture.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Dream Homes Revealed
channel.desc: This week Jennifer Hawkins continues our journey through dream homes across Australia. Owning a home is called the great Australian dream. Join our experts as they reveal four more dream homes from across the country.

channel.desc: We are focus on female fertility as we look at the link between vitamin D and infertility. We share tips on for improve joint health and mobility. We look at some of the things we can do to prolong good eyesight as we age.
